hero.title: Crafting Digital Experiences That Convert
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Designer
hero.description: I build modern web applications and digital products that combine beautiful design with powerful functionality. From concept to launch, I help businesses grow through strategic development.

services.label: What We Do
services.title: Services that scale your business
services.description: Full-stack expertise across design, development, and strategy. I partner with brands to create digital products that are beautiful, fast, and built to convert.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Custom websites and web applications built with modern frameworks like Next.js, React, and TypeScript.

uxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uxDesign.description: Beautiful, intuitive interfaces that users love and that drive conversions.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile apps with React Native that work seamlessly on iOS and Android.

perf.title: Performance Optimization
perf.description: Speed up your existing website with advanced optimization techniques.

seo.title: SEO & Marketing
seo.description: Technical SEO, content strategy, and analytics to increase organic traffic.

support.title: Maintenance & Support
support.description: Ongoing maintenance, updates, and technical support for peace of mind.

process.label: How We Work
process.title: A process built for results
process.description: From discovery to delivery. A collaborative approach that keeps you aligned at every stage and ensures your project ships on time, on budget, and exceeding expectations.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We start with a deep dive into your business goals, target audience, and technical requirements.

design.title: Design & Planning
design.description: I create wireframes and mockups, then plan the technical architecture for your approval.

development.title: Development
development.description: Building your project with clean code, regular updates, and continuous testing.

launch.title: Launch & Support
launch.description: Deploy to production, monitor performance, and provide ongoing support as needed.

techStack.label: Tech Stack
techStack.title: Technologies I work with
techStack.description: Modern tools and frameworks for building scalable, performant applications.

nextjs.name: Next.js
nextjs.description: The React framework for production-grade applications. Next.js gives you the best developer experience with built-in server-side rendering, static generation, TypeScript support, smart bundling, route pre-fetching, and more.

react.name: React
react.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces with component-based architecture. React makes it painless to create interactive UIs with efficient updates and rendering.

typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.description: TypeScript is JavaScript with syntax for types. It's a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

tailwind.name: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces. Tailwind provides low-level utility classes that let you build completely custom designs.

nodejs.name: Node.js
nodejs.description: An open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment designed to build scalable network applications with high performance.

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.description: The world's most advanced open source relational database with proven architecture, reliability, data integrity, and robust feature set.

mongodb.name: MongoDB
mongodb.description: A document-oriented NoSQL database used for high volume data storage with high performance and automatic scaling.

redis.name: Redis
redis.description: An open source in-memory data structure store used as a database, cache, and message broker with sub-millisecond latency.

laravel.name: Laravel
laravel.description: A web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax for rapid development with powerful routing, sessions, and authentication.

reactNative.name: React Native
reactNative.description: Create native apps for Android and iOS using React with truly native UI components and performance across platforms.

framerMotion.name: Framer Motion
framerMotion.description: A production-ready motion library for React that makes it simple to create complex animations with a declarative API.

aws.name: AWS
aws.description: Amazon Web Services offers reliable, scalable, and inexpensive cloud computing services for any scale of business.

docker.name: Docker
docker.description: An open platform for developing, shipping, and running applications with containerization for consistent environments.

git.name: Git
git.description: A free and open source distributed version control system designed for speed and efficiency with lightning fast performance.

figma.name: Figma
figma.description: A collaborative interface design tool with real-time collaboration, prototyping, and developer handoff capabilities.

testimonials.label: Trusted by Industry Leaders
testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say About Our Work
testimonials.description: Real feedback from brands we’ve worked with. From day one to final delivery, collaboration is at the core of everything we do.

herget.name: Jan Herget
herget.content: It’s impressive how quickly and professionally the final product was delivered. Our new website resulted in a 30% increase in bookings within the first two months.

stok.name: Jan Stok
stok.content: Outstanding technical skills combined with excellent communication. Our new booking platform simplified the customer journey and increased conversions by 25%.

matoulek.name: Martin Matoulek
matoulek.content: It’s remarkable what our students are able to build. The development speed and code quality are truly at a top-tier professional level.

anonym.name: Anonymous Client
anonym.content: I’m extremely satisfied with the results of our collaboration. A professional approach and a deep understanding of our needs led to a successful project delivery.

cta.title: Ready to start something amazing?
cta.description: Let's create digital experiences that drive real results. I'm accepting a limited number of projects through 2026.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Real-world projects that showcase my approach to solving complex challenges.

contact.title: Let's build something great
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can work together.

projects.label: Featured Work
projects.title: Projects that Drive Results
projects.description: A selection of impactful work across web development, design, and digital strategy. Each project reflects my commitment to quality and measurable outcomes.

stubnerhof-website.title: Hotel Stubnerhof Website
stubnerhof-website.description: WordPress + Elementor site built for easy editing by the owner, with SEO and multilingual support.
stubnerhof-website.problem: The website needed a modern design, better discoverability, and an editing workflow the owner could manage without developers.
stubnerhof-website.solution: Designed and built a WordPress + Elementor site with improved structure, multilingual setup, and SEO-focused pages.

bks-hotel-digitization.title: Hotel Digitization & Reservation System
bks-hotel-digitization.description: Digitization project for a hotel group including online booking, online check-in, smart locks, and on-site network improvements.
bks-hotel-digitization.problem: High operational load and booking mistakes created unnecessary calls, manual work, and staffing pressure at reception.
bks-hotel-digitization.solution: Implemented a digital guest flow (online booking + online check-in), improved infrastructure, and integrated smart access to reduce manual processes.
results: Reduced need for a full-time reception role

fitconnect-ios.title: FitConnect (iOS)
fitconnect-ios.description: iOS app that connects fitness smart devices into one place to help users track progress and support weight loss goals.
fitconnect-ios.problem: Fitness data is split across multiple devices and platforms, making it hard for users to track progress and stay consistent.
fitconnect-ios.solution: Built an iOS app that aggregates device data through APIs and stores it in a structured backend for easy progress monitoring.
results: Device data centralized into one dashboard
API + database integration for consistent tracking

torvik-lights-website-admin.title: Törvik-Lights Website + News Admin
torvik-lights-website-admin.description: Laravel + MySQL website with an admin/news panel so the owner can publish updates without coding.
torvik-lights-website-admin.problem: Client needed a simple way to publish news and updates without editing code, plus smoother hosting/admin workflow.
torvik-lights-website-admin.solution: Implemented a secure admin panel for creating and publishing news posts and integrated it into the live site.

haslinger-website.title: Alpenpension Haslinger Website
haslinger-website.description: WordPress + Elementor site built for owner-managed edits, SEO, and multilingual content.
haslinger-website.problem: The property needed a modern web presence that converts visitors into reservations and is easy to update.
haslinger-website.solution: Designed and built a multilingual WordPress site with improved structure, SEO, and owner-friendly editing.
results: Higher share of bookings coming through online channels

kidscalling-ios.title: KidsCalling (iOS)
kidscalling-ios.description: iOS app for kids who love calling — with prerecorded voices so they can have fun without disturbing real people.
kidscalling-ios.problem: Kids often want to call repeatedly, which can disturb family members or lead to calling real people unintentionally.
kidscalling-ios.solution: Built a kid-friendly calling experience using prerecorded voice responses to simulate conversations safely.

allProjectsPage.title: All Projects
allProjectsPage.subtitle: A collection of projects I've worked on, from concept to launch.
